name: Samsung  Galaxy Note 2, Unlocked, ON SALE TODAY $300 FREE NTELOS ACTIVATION
description:
NEW OR REFURBISHED
PHONE ONLY OR PHONE WITH ACTIVATION AND 1ST MONTH INCLUDED IN PHONE PRICE

Holiday Savings: Now thru Jan. 1st, 2014 ACTIVATION AND 1ST MONTH ONLY $100 
NTELOS OR FRAWG WIRELESS SERVICES


Phone, Activation and 1st month is INCLUDED in checkout price when you receive the phone your number will be attactched to your invoice. The phone will be ready for use when it arrives. Your bill will be due the following month same day as invoice date and every month after to continue service. There are two affordable and reasonable phone plans that make this package more than a great deal!

Service Provider A:
NTELOS $55 monthly plan
UNLIMITED EVERYTHING
SMS, DATA, MMS, LONG DISTANCE

Service Provider B:
FRAWG $35 monthly plan
UNLIMITED EVERYTHING
SMS, DATA, MMS


Getting a cell phone has never been easier, CHOOSE YOUR PHONE, SELECT YOUR SERVICE, AND CHECK OUT, when your phone arrives your ready to start talking and surfing.

PAY YOU BILL AT ANY NTELOS RETAILER OR AFFILIATED REPRESENTATIVE. (FOR FRAWG TOO)

******Phone line will be put into billers name, multiple phone lines are available.

****BOTH PHONE PLANS ARE NO CONTRACT PLANS

START TALKING TODAY!



******Phones are available for purchase without activation as well

ALL PHONES ARE UNLOCKED WITH CLEAN EINs, THEY ARE NOT AND WILL NOT BE IN ANYONE ELSES NAME OTHER THAN PURCHASED (YOU) OR OTHERWISE REQUESTED DURING CHECKOUT AT THAT TIME PLEASE PROVIDE FULL NAME AND BIRTHDATE.


EIN, Excellent  Condition, New or Refurbished
Unlocked
Touchscreen
Front Facing Camera
WiFi
Bluetooth
Stylus 


Includes: Phone, Battery and Charger with refurbished phones, NEW phones are in unopened factory sealed boxes.
